sentences.en: Bye Mum, see you in a minute.
Dickens felt compelled to return to the stage for a final good-bye.
sentences.cn: 迪肯斯觉得必须返回舞台作最后的道别。

sentences.en: Fran slipped the catch on the door, then turned to say good - bye .
sentences.cn: 弗兰拉开门闩, 然后转身说“ 再见 ”.

sentences.en: Good - bye , old chap, I'll see you on my return.
sentences.cn: 再见 吧, 老伙计, 等我回来再见面.

sentences.en: Good - bye then! Mind how you go!
He stood mournfully at the gate waving bye bye.
sentences.cn: 他伤心地站在门口，挥手告别。

sentences.en: I must say good - bye now.
If you lend him money, you can kiss it good - bye.
sentences.cn: 如果你借给他钱, 你就甭想他还你.

sentences.en: They hurried into the city to say good - bye to us.
sentences.cn: 他们赶进城来和我们告别.

sentences.en: We said good - bye to each other at the station.
We said good - bye, then he turned and walked off without another word.
sentences.cn: 我们说了声“再见”, 他便转身离去,没再说一句话.

sentences.en: We waved good - bye to her at the airport.
sentences.cn: 我们在机场向她挥手告别.

phrases.phrase: by the bye 或 by the by

trans.tran_cn: 次要的东西，（体育比赛中）轮空
